message:
(AU) New X-ray technology that can reveal drug smugglers' internal cavities will be trialled at airports under a plan to fast-track security searches.  Legislation before Federal Parliament would enable customs officers to use new body scanners instead of sending suspects to hospital for internal X-rays ordered by a doctor, reported the Herald Sun. Federal police wasted more than 4600 hours in hospital waiting rooms last year because of drug smugglers waiting for scans.
